QuestData.Title: Fire At Will
QuestData.Description: Look out there, the wings of the bats fill the sky. We must offer what ranged support we can, but our hands are full here.$b$bIt looks like the Legion has not yet destroyed all of the artillery batteries. If you can get to one, you should be able to show those flying fiends the Light.
QuestData.LogDescription: Enter a Lightforged Battery and slay $1oa Frenzied Plaguewings.
QuestData.CompletionText: Those bats are always a nuisance to deal with. This method will be more... efficient, I believe.
QuestData.RewardText: We may be grounded, but that does not mean they have to rule the skies!
